Crosswalking The Authorities

Carl Boettiger

2018-10-19

Source: vignettes/articles/crosswalk.Rmd
crosswalk.Rmd
library(taxald)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
fish <- taxa_tbl("fb")

my_taxa <- 
  fish %>%  
  select(fb = id, species) %>% 
  collect() %>%
  mutate(itis = ids(species, "itis"),
         ncbi = ids(species, "ncbi"),
         #col = ids(species, "col"),
         gbif = ids(species, "gbif"),
         #wd = ids(species, "wd"),
         tpl = ids(species, "tpl"),
        # fb = ids(species, "fb"),
         slb = ids(species, "slb")) 
my_taxa %>% 
  select(-species) %>% 
  purrr::map_dbl(function(x) sum(!is.na(x)))
#>    fb  itis  ncbi  gbif   tpl   slb 
#> 33538 25713   304 18690     3     0

Looks like three plants have matching scientific names to some of our fish:

dup <- fish %>% pull(species) %>% ids(authority = "tpl", pull = FALSE) %>% filter(!is.na(id))
dup
#> # A tibble: 3 x 4
#>   id         name                  rank    accepted_name        
#>   <chr>      <chr>                 <chr>   <chr>                
#> 1 TPL:57374  Centropogon australis species Centropogon australis
#> 2 TPL:236238 Orestias elegans      species Orestias elegans     
#> 3 TPL:300628 Rondeletia bicolor    species Rondeletia bicolor

This also probably explains why col and wd are returning the wrong-length matches:

species <- pull(fish, species)

col_fb <- ids(species, "col", pull = FALSE) 
dim(col_fb)[1] - length(species)
#> [1] 7

wd_fb <- ids(species, "wd", pull = FALSE) 
dim(wd_fb)[1] - length(species)
#> [1] 3

#col_hierarchy <- classification(id = col_fb$id) %>% filter(kingdom == "Animalia") 

taxa_tbl("col", "hierarchy") %>%
  filter(kingdom == "Animalia") %>%
  semi_join(select(col_fb, id), copy = TRUE) %>%
  select(id, species) %>% 
  collect()
#> Joining, by = "id"
#> # A tibble: 32,361 x 2
#>    id           species     
#>    <chr>        <chr>       
#>  1 COL:21092068 immaculata  
#>  2 COL:21092241 felis       
#>  3 COL:21092375 bentincki   
#>  4 COL:21092504 rubrofuscus 
#>  5 COL:21092598 acuminatus  
#>  6 COL:21092599 sadina      
#>  7 COL:21092690 grandicassis
#>  8 COL:21092694 ansorgii    
#>  9 COL:21092789 lineolata   
#> 10 COL:21093101 melanotheron
#> # ... with 32,351 more rows
has_match <- my_taxa %>% 
  select(-species) %>%
  purrr::map_dfc(function(x) !is.na(x)) %>% 
  rowSums() > 0

my_taxa %>% filter(!has_match)
#> # A tibble: 0 x 7
#> # ... with 7 variables: fb <chr>, species <chr>, itis <chr>, ncbi <chr>,
#> #   gbif <chr>, tpl <chr>, slb <chr>
